price: who will inherit Paradise[3]; they will abide therein forever.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: [3] Al-Firdaws: the highest rank in Paradise.
